title: hariya neneyirO
sahitya:
hariya neneyirO namma hariya neneyirO


anupallavi

  bariya mAtanADi bAya baraDu mADi keDalu bEDi


caraNam 1    nityavalla I sharIra anityavendu nODirayya hottu kaLeya bEDi kAla mrtyu bAhOdIgale
    caraNam 2    kAma krOdhagaLanu toredu kAmanayyana katheya baredu prEmadinda bhajisirayya pAmararante tirugade
    caraNam 3    hALu haraTeyADi manava bILu mADi koLLa bEDi Elu dinada katheya kELi ElirO vaikuNThake
    caraNam 4    meTTe puNya kSEtravannu suTTu hOgvudayya pApa muTTi bhajisirayya purandara viTTalanna caraNava
